name: slontech-syntax
description: Dark theme for web developers ( PHP, HTML ,LESS ,MYSQL ,JQUERY )
readme:
# slontech-syntax theme This theme is focused on web development using HTML, CSS/LESS, PHP, MYSQL, jQuerry, AJAX. This is a dark theme with lots of color.

HTML and PHP
